►►► This video ◄◄◄  

Gaming on Linux is on the rise. SteamOS and the Steam Deck popularized it, desktop distros like Bazzite and Cachy are taking it to the next level. I tried it on some Lenovo hardware and dove into the buisness logic.

The Story Behind
